com.panviva.util.pgc.dom.processing

Class Transformer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.panviva.util.pgc.dom.processing.Transformer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ITransform
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CopyTransformer, CreateTransformer, DeleteTransformer, ReplaceTransformer

    public abstract class Transformer
extends java.lang.Object
implements ITransform
    This class is an abstract implementation of the ITransform interface. All rule specific transformations will be derived from this class providing rule type and target specific document transformations.
    Author:
    jcharles
